title: China's Xi positioned to rule indefinitely
text:
China's Xi positioned to rule indefinitely Sunday, February 25, 2018 - 00:52 
China's ruling Communist Party proposed changes to the constituion that would allow President Xi Jinping to rule more than the current limit of two term.   
China's ruling Communist Party proposed changes to the constituion that would allow President Xi Jinping to rule more than the current limit of two term.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/25/chinas-xi-positioned-to-rule-indefinitel?videoId=404224152&videoChannel=13422
